section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Privasee are a company specialising in training for compliance and certification of privacy laws including GDPR. 
 
We also offer DPO services, general consulting on privacy and data protection and develop privacy enhancing software, GDPR compliance platforms and other technologies focused on privacy and data protection. 
 
We also firmly believe in Privacy and Data Protection as fundamental rights under the European Charter of Fundamental Rights and as an ethical and responsible company believe we should be involved in all policy discussions relating to these rights.  As such we intend to respond to consultations, events and lobby on matters of privacy and data protection.
